Name: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 7
About the game: Magic or reality? Adventure or everyday life? The world of the Brothers Grimm fairy tales gives an unambiguous answer! Collect cards according to chain rules and enjoy the challenging levels of a magical fairy tale world! You have 200 interesting levels with hidden gold cards. Use the additional bonuses of joker, turn reversal, and shuffle to collect them. - 200 levels in 20 locations - Solitaire card game - assemble a chain of cards! - Use the joker when you get stuck - Combo multiplier, will give you more coins! - 15 medieval rewards! - Original themed decks and - 12 styles of card shirts!
